mapper.insert: insert into reserve (member_id, member_nick, use_date, use_start_time, use_end_time, reserve_status, reserve_count, room_id, cafe_id ) values (#{member_id}, #{member_nick}, #{use_date}, #{use_start_time}, #{use_end_time}, "Y", #{reserve_count}, #{room_id}, #{cafe_id})
insert into pay (reserve_id, member_id, pay_state, pay_amount, pay_date) values (#{reserve_id}, #{member_id}, #{pay_state}, #{total_amount}, now())

insert into calendar_day_plan (plan_year, plan_month, plan_date, member_id, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, plan_desc) values (#{plan_year}, #{plan_month}, #{plan_date}, #{member_id}, #{use_start_time}, #{use_end_time}, #{item_name} )
